TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataListDesigner extends System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner

summary.span: 扩展 Web 服务器控件的设计时行为。

span.span: Extends design-time behavior for the Web server control.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何扩展 该类。The following code example demonstrates how to extend the class. 此代码将重写 方法，以便在控件启用时显示一个显示为紫色的五个点的边框 。The code overrides the method to display a five-point border that is purple if the control is enabled. [!code-csharp[DataGriddesigner_Sample2#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataGridDesigner_Sample2/CS/SimpleGridView.cs#10)] [!code-csharp[DataGriddesigner_Sample2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataGridDesigner_Sample2/CS/SimpleGridView.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataGriddesigner_Sample2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataGridDesigner_Sample2/VB/SimpleGridView.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何使用将 设计器与控件相关联 。The following code example shows how to use the to associate the designer with the control. [!code-csharp[DataGridDesigner_Sample2#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataGridDesigner_Sample2/CS/SimpleGridView.cs#6)] [!code-vb[DataGridDesigner_Sample2#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataGridDesigner_Sample2/VB/SimpleGridView.vb#6)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

param.name: disposing
param.span: 为 则既释放托管资源又释放非托管资源；为 则仅释放非托管资源。

span.span: to release both the managed and unmanaged resources; to release only the unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放由 对象占用的非托管资源并（可选）释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the object and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 `disposing` 为时 `true` ，此 方法将释放由该对象引用的托管对象所持有的所有资源 。When `disposing` is `true`, the method releases all resources held by the managed objects that this object references.

para.span: 此 方法可由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: The method can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 重写时，请确保不引用已在先前对的调用中释放的对象 。

span.span: When overriding it, ensure that you do not reference objects that have been disposed in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现的详细信息 ，请参阅 [实现 Dispose 方法](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose).

para.span: 有关和方法的详细 信息 ，请参阅 [清理非托管资源](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged) 和 [重写 Finalize 方法](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100))。

span.span: For more information about the and methods, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100)).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string GetDesignTimeHtml() cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetDesignTimeHtml () As String

summary.span: 获取设计时用于表示 控件的 HTML。

span.span: Gets the HTML used to represent the control at design time.

returns.span: 设计时用于表示 控件的 HTML。

span.span: The HTML that is used to represent the control at design time.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写 方法。The following code example shows how to override the method. 如果控件的属性为，则它会在设计图面上改变控件的外观 `true` 。It alters the appearance of the control on the design surface if the control's property is `true`. 该代码使用 `Try...Catch...Finally` 语法来执行以下操作：The code uses `Try...Catch...Finally` syntax to do the following: - `Try`节更改控件的属性值。The `Try` section changes the values of the properties of the control. - `Catch`节捕获任何异常并将其发送到 方法。The `Catch` section catches any exceptions and sends them to the method. - `Finally`节将属性设置为其原始值。The `Finally` section sets the properties to their original values. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[DataGridDesigner_Sample2#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataGridDesigner_Sample2/CS/SimpleGridView.cs#2)] [!code-vb[DataGridDesigner_Sample2#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataGridDesigner_Sample2/VB/SimpleGridView.vb#2)]
